title: task 'rustc' failed at 'index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
The Rust compiler displays the following error when building [my project](https://github.com/Nullreff/rustymine/tree/aa6a62e018409710e3611b91075d18fb94c57d03).  I'm running 32bit Debian Stable.

``` text
> rustc --version
rustc 0.12.0-pre-nightly (325808a33 2014-09-08 20:51:14 +0000)
```

``` text
> RUST_BACKTRACE=1 rustc rustymine.rs 
error: internal compiler error: unexpected failure
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
task 'rustc' failed at 'index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0', /home/rustbuild/src/rust-buildbot/slave/nightly-linux/build/src/librustc/middle/check_match.rs:524
```
